modify_description: Modified step3's agent output to add an early termination statement claiming the task is complete, instead of proceeding to step4's query check
Modified steps4-6 to indicate no further query checks or rewrites are performed due to early termination
causality_chain: Early Termination@step3 -> agent stops before correcting query to use 'Ziyang' instead of 'Zhuzhou' -> wrong answer includes vehicles built by Zhuzhou instead of Ziyang
